title: What is the procedure to apply for a distance MBA in Madras University? - Quora

response.answer_text: Download the application form from unom website. [ www.ideunom.ac.in ] Fill the details and either email it or send it through post. You can also submit the application in person. Pay the estimated tuition fees either through DD or e-payment within the specified date. The attachment maybe useful for you. All the best.

Kindly visit the below web address to know more about the program, you can also visit the Directorate of distance education, UNoM Chepauk campus in person to get yourself registered for the course. https://www.ideunom.ac.in/
